articles.title: Google has a new trick to tackle Covid-19 misinformation - HT Tech
articles.description: Google today announced that it is launching a new feature on Search that will surface a list of authorized vaccines in their location as well as information panels on each individual vaccine when people look up information for Covid-19 vaccines.
articles.content: Google this year has rolled out a host of features to combat the spread of misinformation pertaining to Covid-19 on its platform. The company has not only rolled out a new website but it has also mad… [+1660 chars]
